## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [boundingBoxIntersection(box)](./common.abstractsegment.boundingboxintersection.md) |  | Computes the list of points on the segment that intersect the given bounding box, which is an object of the form { x:.., y:.., w:.., h:.. }<!-- -->.  lineIntersection |
|  [boxIntersection(x, y, w, h)](./common.abstractsegment.boxintersection.md) |  | Computes the list of points on the segment that intersect the box with the given origin and size.  boxIntersection |
|  [findClosestPointOnPath(x, y)](./common.abstractsegment.findclosestpointonpath.md) |  | Function: findClosestPointOnPath Finds the closest point on this segment to the given \[x, y\], returning both the x and y of the point plus its distance from the supplied point, and its location along the length of the path inscribed by the segment. This implementation returns Infinity for distance and null values for everything else subclasses are expected to override. |
